attributes.action: eGovt Petition admin HELP http://epetitions.direct.gov.uk/petitions/63053 - I have used the wrong web site at the bottom of our petition
attributes.additional_details:
Hi admin - can you PLEASE help me - I have used the incorrect web site on the above petition which has just gone live - title  "Save Blue Mountain Golf and Conference Centre, Binfield - KEEP the legal agreement protecting this land from development"

Can you change the web site at the bottom to (just adding .uk at the end....
www.savebluemountain.org.uk
There is no other way to contact you..???
Thank you
Lis Casey

rejection.details: Please email your query to petitions@commonsleader.x.gsi.gov.uk
